effect.sun-moon: Inflicts regular damage. User takes 1/3 the damage it inflicts in recoil.
effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Inflicts regular damage. User takes 1/3 the damage it inflicts in recoil.
effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Inflicts regular damage. User takes 1/3 the damage it inflicts in recoil.

short_effect.sun-moon: User receives 1/3 the damage inflicted in recoil.
short_effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: User receives 1/3 the damage inflicted in recoil.
short_effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: User receives 1/3 the damage inflicted in recoil.

flavor_text.sun-moon: A reckless, life-risking tackle. This also damages the user quite a lot.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: A reckless, life-risking tackle. This also damages the user quite a lot.
